name: FATbit Technologies
description:
FATbit is a leading software solution & mobile app development company with an aim to create long-term values for the clients. Established in 2004, we focus on developing result-driven and customer-centric solutions based on the insights that we gained from years of industry experience. We help start-ups and large enterprises bring a competitive edge to their business by improving time to market through our ready to launch multi-vendor e-commerce platforms. 
Our market-leading solutions developed with cutting-edge technologies incorporate the latest industry trends and scalability. Our reign of services extends from B2B e-commerce solutions to analysis and development. We cater to the business requirements of all types of organizations from start-ups to large scale enterprises and provide growth-oriented digital outcomes.
We address the challenges that businesses face while planning and executing the digitization of their ideas. We are a team of smart-working and result-driven professionals committed to scaling the growth of our clients with our pioneer ideas and domain expertise. We inculcate forward-thinking, mutual trust, and practical approach in our organization and build solutions using the best industry practices and agile methodology. Our list of products includes a wide array of market-ready e-commerce platforms that are designed to reduce the go-to-market time. Products:Yo!KartYo!RentGrowcerYo!YummVivoCabsFunAwayYo!MealsYo!GigsYo!CoachYo!DriveYo!Care...and more on https://www.fatbit.com/multivendor-ecommerce-marketplace-platforms.html We provide valuable services in multiple verticals like:
MVP DevelopmentEnterprise ApplicationCRM SolutionsCMS DevelopmentUser Experience DesignGrowth Oriented ServicesConsultancy
Get in touch with FATbit www.fatbit.com
